name: Market V'room
description:
This was a small game I made an polish for the Ludum dare 37. In this game you control a shopping kart and you must to do all shopping list faster that possible.

Control with gamepad is greatly recommanded.

Right Trigger / Up Arrow to accelerate
Left Trigger / Space to break
A / Ctrl to pick an item.

Tools to make this game :
- Unity3D
- Pyxel
- GarageBand

The link of the ludum dare submit :
Ludum Dare 37 page

Created by Vianney Thurotte
